# toml++ Vendorized Copy

This directory contains a copy of the header-only library `toml++`.

- **Original Repository:** [https://github.com/marzer/tomlplusplus](https://github.com/marzer/tomlplusplus)
- **Version/Commit:** v3.4.0 (Commit `3017243`)
- **License:** MIT License (See repository for full text)
- **Date Vendorized:** 2025-11-27

---
**DO NOT MODIFY** files in this directory directly. To update, replace the existing files with the new version from the source repository.
